original_text: When the king of Moab saw that the battle was going against him, he took with him 700 swordsmen to break through, opposite the king of Edom, but they could not.
korean_text: 모압 왕이 전세가 극렬하여 당하기 어려움을 보고 칼찬 군사 칠백 명을 거느리고 돌파하여 지나서 에돔 왕에게로 가고자 하되 가지 못하고

sentences.original_text: When the king of Moab saw that the battle was going against him,
sentences.korean_translation: 모압 왕이 싸움이 자기에게 불리하게 된 것을 보고는,

sentences.original_text: he took with him 700 swordsmen to break through,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 칼 든 자 700명을 이끌고 돌파하려고 하였으나,
